Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Education.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Education
Oversight - Seal of Biliteracy in DOE High Schools and at CUNY.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Seal of Biliteracy in DOE High Schools and at CUNY.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to ensure that the New York State Seal of Biliteracy is awarded in all New York City public high schools to eligible students.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Department of Education to ensure that the New York State Seal of Biliteracy is awarded in all New York City public high schools to eligible students.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on The City University of New York to ensure that all campuses award an appropriate number of college credits to students who earned a New York State Seal of Biliteracy in high school and, where required, accept that Seal as fulfillment of any foreign language requirement.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: CUNY to ensure that all campuses award an appropriate number of college credits to students who earned a New York State Seal of Biliteracy in high school and, where required, accept that Seal as fulfillment of any foreign language requirement.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Joseph, De La Rosa, Menin, Lee, Louis, Aviles, Gutierrez, Hanif, Restler, Sanchez, Stevens, Krishnan, Hanks and Ung
